schema.description: This view joins address data from multiple tables (adrc, adr6, adrct) to provide a comprehensive view of customer addresses, including communication details.  It filters for addresses with a valid-to date of '9999-12-31', indicating active addresses.

description.value: Converted name field with form of address
City code for city street file
District code for city and street file
Different city for city street file
Street number for city street file
Flag: There are more address group assignments
Flag: This is a personal address
Name (field name 1) in uppercase for search help
City name in uppercase for search help
Street name in uppercase for search help
County name in uppercase for search help
Township name in uppercase for search help
Flag: This address is the default address
Flag: This communication number is not used
Recipient address in this communication type
Flag: Recipient is standard recipient for this address
Flag: Connected to an SAP system
Flag: Receiver can receive TNEF encoding by SMTP
